Subject: Use DPI Blocking URL blocking MS teams activities for personal account
Description: We recently using DPI Blocking URL to block MS OneDrive upload events for personal account and only allow upload to the company's account. Can we do the same for MS Teams?
What_We_Know__c:
5/16/2025

- Sent customer follow up email 
5/1/2025

- Customer seeking clarification that there’s no way to blocking selectively to MS Teams account. What if they setup DPI URL blocking to MS OneDrive, will the file still be saved to user’s OneDrive when they share the files through MS Teams?

4/25/2025
- Customer wants to know if he can use DPI blocking with URL for blocking MS teams activities for personal accounts

- Sent email stating that this is not possible currently
Solution_Comment__c: Customer wanted to know if it were possible to block onedrive attachments from being upload through Teams by adding the URL to the Denylist. Tested condition and was not able to block attachments from Teams. Was able to block all attachments in teams including onedrive. Customer has requested to close case.
